attributes.action: Switch pound to new zealand dollar
attributes.additional_details:
The sterling is losing it's value more and more each day and needs to be replaced.
The euro would financially cripple the UK and is no good.

However I believe that the New Zealand dollar would be best for the UK as it is the strongest currency in the world.

Please sign this petition if you agree that the British pound sterling should be switched to the New Zealand dollar.
Thank you
